item.title: Danielle add a quote by Hayao Miyazaki
item.description: "I'm not going to make movies that tell children, "You should despair and run away"." -- Hayao Miyazaki

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Betty Friedan
item.description: "No woman gets an orgasm from shining the kitchen floor. " -- Betty Friedan

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "I don't know why no one ever thought to paste a label on the toilet-tissue spindle giving 1-2-3 directions for replacing the tissue on it. Then everyone in the house would know what Mama knows." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Cheris Kramarae
item.description: "Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings." -- Cheris Kramarae

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Joanne Harris
item.description: "Happiness. Simple as a glass of chocolate or tortuous as the heart. Bitter. Sweet. Alive." -- Joanne Harris

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Tim Wise
item.description: "The power of resistance is to set an example: not necessarily to change the person with whom you disagree, but to empower the one who is watching and whose growth is not yet completed, whose path is not at all clear, whose direction is still very much up in the proverbial air." -- Tim Wise

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Classic' - a book which people praise and don't read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "God created war so that Americans would learn geography." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Education consists mainly of what we have unlearned." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The Bible has noble poetry in it... and some good morals and a wealth of obscenity, and upwards of a thousand lies." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Catherynne M. Valente
item.description: "We all live inside the terrible engine of authority, and it grinds and shrieks and burns so that no one will say: lines on maps are silly." -- Catherynne M. Valente

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Danielle add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "There are three things all wise men fear: the sea in storm, a night with no moon, and the anger of a gentle man." -- Patrick Rothfuss
